entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing drizzle or drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to freezing drizzle or flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing drizzle. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
